subject: Move jest.setup.pre.js from create-only to copy-overwrite (expo)
description:
Delete expo/create-only/jest.setup.pre.js and create expo/copy-overwrite/jest.setup.pre.js with base-only pre-setup. Add require("./jest.setup.pre.local") at end. Keep: structuredClone polyfill, __unhandledRejectionHandler, RNTL_SKIP_AUTO_CLEANUP, __DEV__/IS_REACT_ACT_ENVIRONMENT/IS_REACT_NATIVE_TEST_ENVIRONMENT, __fbBatchedBridgeConfig, TurboModule proxy, timer polyfills, window mock.

**Verification:** `ls expo/copy-overwrite/jest.setup.pre.js && ! ls expo/create-only/jest.setup.pre.js 2>/dev/null`

verification.expected: file exists in copy-overwrite, not in create-only
